document_data.name: ''Amulet of Proof Against Petrification''
document_data.mainbody:
An '''''amulet of proof against petrification''''' was an amulet that gave its wearer immunity to any attacks, [[spell]]s, or effects that would cause them to be [[petrified]].

These amulets were particularly popular in the [[South Faer√ªn|Shining South]].
document_data.Creation: These amulets were created with a casting of the spell ''[[stone to flesh]]''.
